name: R.U.I.N
description:
Welcome Seeker 14RT6. 

You have been selected to participate in the R.U.I.N program. 

Your task is to travel to the first section of the RUIN simulation system where the world Ryhul has been reconstructed using donated memories. 

Your objectives are to find information about what led to the destruction of Ryhul and how the people lived before its downfall. 

Enter the simulation to receive training instructions. 

3rd Year Exam Game - WITS University
